llm.feedback:
Up | 0–12 months | Strengthen the link from AI productivity uplift to sector reallocation and policy reaction (NL5YYTLF2) | Watch AI adoption pace, sector reallocation to AI/semiconductors, and capex momentum, including the ~25% high automation risk and ~70% of task content at risk (NL5YYTLF2) | 60%
Up | 12–36 months | Escalate the upside toward Regime A (60–70% weight) with policy and capex triggers (NL5YYTLF2)(T1QE6JPIX) | Watch semiconductor capex cadence and tariff-policy evolution (NL5YYTLF2)(T1QE6JPIX) | 65%
Down | 12–24 months | Clarify Regime C tilt as credible: growth slowdown and inflation persistence; insert explicit invalidation rules (rising wage growth, persistent inflation) (NL5YYTLF2) | Watch debt trajectory, tariff escalation, and external realignments shaping risk premia (EPJYXB7DX)(0J41Q7KTX) | 40%
Down | 6–18 months | Emphasize policy mispricing and external frictions as durable downsides; add concrete triggers and early invalidation signals (NL5YYTLF2)(SGB2PAZGK) | Watch tariff cadence, central-bank guidance, and long-run care inflation dynamics (0J41Q7KTX)(U6HXAJR4J) | 30%
